Product Name: Herbal Essences Shampoo Scalp Soothing Tea Tree Oil Hair Care 400ml
Comment:
Usage Experience:this Tea tree oil shampoo from Herbal Essences is truly creamier compared  to other Herbal Essences with its tea tree oil ingredient.It removes built up and residue easily.
Packaging:No leakage upon receiving even if the cap is unsealed.New bottle from Procter & Gamble-Thailand looks laid back and still thicker compared to other new thinner Herbal Essences recycled bottled.
Fragrance:Fragrance is minty citrus

This is only my 3rd day of using the shampoo so i cannot still vouch if this would improve my scalp with squeaky clean effect, especially from the unfortunate dandruff i am experiencing.But for now it truly invigorates my scalp along with my Argan oil & Green Tea sulfate free conditioner from USA.
